about_the_game:
It's time behold the Attack & Defenders!



Complete your collection and show off your style!
This pack of ten characters can be used in either single-player or multiplayer modes.

Pack includes:
131. Zen the Ninja
149. Rocky the Rock Golem
037. Sir the Knight
024. Lips the cyberpunk tech
198. Davey the Skeleton
190. Grant the Elite Soldier
054. Jake the FBI Agent
091. Ryan the SWAT leader
085. Cam the Sniper
058. Slurp the Army comedian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 780 GTX / AMD R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enhance your gameplay with this Finders Reapers Monsters & Icons character pack. Collect all the characters, complete your collection and take them online.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
